Oracle: VCN is Oracle's equivalent to VPC and VNet

Google Cloud: default network for a new project
VPC size range is between /16 and /9
Oracle: the allowed VCN size range is /16 to /30.

AWS: AWS reserves 5 IP addresses within each subnet
Oracle: reserves 3 IP addresses within each subnet

AWS: Subnets types: Private, Public and VPN-only
Azure: Subnets types: Private, Public and Gateway
Oracle: regional, availability domain [ Access type - Private / Public]

AWS: Secure your network using NACLs and Security Groups.
Azure: Secure your network using NSGs and ASGs.
Virtual Network NAT, Azure Route Server (preview)
Application Gateway, Load Balancer, Traffic Manager, Azure DNS
Oracle: OCI Load Balancing Service -includes Load Balancer and Network Load Balancer.

AWS: VPC Peering | AWS Direct Connect Gateway|Transit Gateway
i)VPN (Virtual Private Network) ii)AWS Direct Connect
Google Cloud: i)Google Cloud VPN ii)Google Cloud Interconnect

Oracle: DNS management and traffic management steering policies
